description:
As a Runa customer
  I want to create bulk order by uploading my CSV file
name: Create bulk order using Runa

elements.name: Create reward link order using Individual order in Runa- new card payment

steps.name: the user is logged in as DD breakage customer and on the home page
the user has the BulkOrder flag turned on

result.error_message:

steps.name: the user navigates to create order page
the user selects an option between Quick Order and Bulk Order
user selects 'Individual Order'
user lands in step1 order page for 'Quick Order'
the user fills in the order details
the user selects all brands from brands page
the user proceeds to upload page
the user navigates to quantity page and selects reward links option
the user fills number of reward links as '13'
the user navigates to payment page
the user fills in the payment card details
the user clicks confirm and pay button
the user fills and submits 3d secure pop up
the user should be redirected to successful order created page
the user should be able to verify the order details confirming the country ordered

elements.name: Create reward link order using Bulk order in Runa - saved card payment

steps.name: the user is logged in as DD breakage customer and on the home page
the user has the BulkOrder flag turned on

steps.name: the user navigates to create order page
the user selects an option between Quick Order and Bulk Order
user selects 'Bulk Order'
user lands in step1 order page for 'Bulk Order'
the user fills in the order details
the user selects all brands from brands page
the user proceeds to upload page
user is navigated to file upload page
user succesfully uploads the csv file with order details
the user navigates to payment page
user clicks on review order CTA
validates the order summary
user can close the summary and return to payment page
the user fills in the payment card details
the user clicks confirm and pay button
the user fills and submits 3d secure pop up
the user should be redirected to successful order created page
the user should be able to verify the order details confirming the country ordered

elements.name: Validate back button in create order page - on click navigates user back to home page
